reviews: Product is amazing, The Build quality is nice and the image quality is awesome. The auto focus is smooth as butter. Best for videos.

Bought this DSLR on Big billion sale. Very happy with the performence through 18-55 stm lens. Some sample photos which I have transferred to my mobile, are attached here. I am extremely happy with its low light performance. All the photos here are unedited. I was bit confused between M50 and 200d mark II but atlast choosed the later one for its wide variety of lens options.

So, The camera comes with a standard lens to get you started. The build quality is great. Feels good in the hand. Lightweight and compact. This comes with the new Digic 8 image processor. And does a fine job out of the box. And editing some photos may also shock you with excellent results. 10/10 Will recommend.  If you're a beginner and looking to stick with a DSLR and grow with it then look no further. I've added 2 of the best photos I took with the stock lens. Used Lightroom to finish it off.
Super camera. Eazy to use. Photos is perfect. 55-250mm super clarity. Both 2 lence is perfect. Vedio and photo 4K vedio👌👌👌👌 not good for wedding photography.

It was amazing product.. I'm really happy with that... I'm from north-east india. And purchasing product online is  not so trendy. But i know well flipkart never take a risk. They send me the product very well... Packaging is good.. And also the product what you expect is great. I have some image of portraits that we take with this product with kit lense 18-55mm the result is great. I have neutral the colure, contrast,and also saturation.

This is a really good DSLR by canon . I was confused between Canon and Nikon. But I came to know that Nikon is only good for photography and the video quality is not upto mark. This Canon dslr is really awesome with great features.
Anyone searching for a good camera under 50000 should go for this model. It's good in both video and photo.

very easy user interface so that any beginner like me got familiar with its functionality, it's auto focus I think beast in this price range,thanks to Flipkart team for timely delivered.overall worth for money

I am just falling in love with the camera the more I am using it everyday. Everything is almost as expected from a Canon DSLR. The touch is very sensitive, the camera built is premium, response is fast l thanx to its all latest digic 8 processor. The photo taken are of great quality even on lowlights.  Attached is a Sam photo taken after sunset with lowest daylight condition. There are more sample photos to be taken, I will upload more in the coming days.

If you are a pro photographer, then both the lenses you should buy, and always clicks pics in manual mood, it's really fun to take pics with the 55-250mm zoom lens... later on you can buy 50mm f1.8 STM lens as your requirement.... Otherwise this product is A+ !! Go ahead guys for this DSLR !!!
My First DSLR and it makes me proud.
It has only 9focus point only, meanwhile if you're really dedicated for your passion and photography, it can't stop you for taking good photos.
•Long Exposure ✔️

reviews: After using for a short period of time, it gives professional experience. Great quality product with this budget. I want you to prefer   Sony alpha ILCE -6000Y for beginner photography.  cinematic video recording is awesome at this price. I just attaching few photos below to show my experience.
Pros:
1. Features/Price in Camera body
2. EVF, Focus Peeking in manual focus.
3. Wifi connectivity - simplifies workflow
4. Adapted lenses, availability of adapters (shop from aliexpress)
5. USB charging - supplied charger is too slow, i use my power bank 1.2 A output to charge my sony a6000
6. Size, Weight
Cons:
1. Lenses

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. canon is a user friendly cam, it is basically good for videography.

if you want to upgrade your photography Tallents , and you are looking for a mid range cam ,. 100% go for it.,

Through WiFi and snapbridge downloading photos in smartphone from camera is too easy. It supports Bluetooth also. I...

Wow, love the Camera....I have already used Nikon d 3500 in my Laboratory but this camera is far better. Flipkart delivered at time and the product was at best conditions. This is my first personal DSLR, so guys after using for 2 weeks, I must say that go for it, there is no other camera which could provide same level as Nikon d 5600.
Colour tone production, lots of effect, smooth touch screen, good battery life, etc.
Just go for it.

My First DSLR and the best decision that I made. The KIT lenses are not so ideal for lowlight photography but you can always get the best out of it. Overall very satisfied with the quality of photos, camera body and lens to start the learning process.
No doubt Nikon's lineup for intermediate DSLR are catchworthy .
but one must also invest in additional lenses to get the most out of d5600 .
like in my case I ordered 35mm 1.8g lens when  paired with d5600 produced great results .
not going over the specifications. camera is just awesome produces detailed and sharp images .
70-300 lens do have its own advantages .but after 250mm its just doesn't perform up to the mark.but hey! you get this in that price bracket which is fine to me .

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.

reviews: Full review
1. Stabilization- mind blowing, i never seen before that, better than GoPro hypersmooth
2. Mic- without external mic, you can vlog on this camera. Also mic better than GoPro hero8
3. Video Quality- video quality is really good, ( one advantage is dewarp mode ), video quality is better than GoPro Hero 7 black, but GoPro Hero 8 is slightly better than Dji osmo action camera,
4. Front display- it's really helpful for vlogging
5. Battery- 1300mAh
Video recording time
4k 60fps ...
Fantastic action  camera just love the fast delivery and packaging!! ROCKSTEADY works really good
Awesome camera with image stabilization.

unbelievable picture quality. sound quality is good but recommend an external mic if need an extra clear voice over. battery life is ok but if planning to go for a long video shoot recommend extra batteries or can use power bank.
under water experience was awesome. went upto 30 feet but anything beyond that requires additional protection.
overall experience recommend 5 stars for an action camera performance.
It's a superb action camera with VERY USEFUL & HANDY FEATURES. The build is very robust and feels fit for professional use.
The front screen is extremely helpful for vlog and p2c style video. Video and Image quality are really good.
Video stabilization and Frame rates are awesome. The only drawback is the battery backup, heating issues and slight lag in the live-view.
Amazing Stabilization,
Amazing Clarity,
Front Screen feature is cool,
Easy interface,
Battery life better than GoPro.
All good, But if you are selling the camera please sell the batteries as well...
Also still waiting for the ext mic to be enabled....
GoPro 7 black seems better in some terms.
Noticed a lot of noise in image after processing.
GoPro's Hypersmooth also looks more stable than DJI's Rocksteady.
Best one. Loved each and Every Feature of it. Please release the new one with External mic DJI.

Great product and a good competition to gopro hero7 black. But lacks rocksteady mode in 4K 4:3 mode. Else it's the best product in the price range..the front screen gives it an edge over competition. Also battery life could have been better. Firmware updates are glitchy as well.
Love this action cam.

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.

reviews: it's a good camera and the best thing about it is the gimbal like stabilization of the camera .
Now from my experience and using it for my recent trip to Dharamsala, here are some of the pros and cons I noticed:
Pros
1.Gimbal like stabilization.
2.Overall Video quality.
3.Protune features and flat profile make editing easier .
4.Manual ISO and shutter control options .
5.Timewarp feature
6.Nightlapse
Cons
1.Still image quality
2.Low light performance is average
3.No carrying case not even ...
TRAGIC BATTERY LIFE. No one warned me before buying that it's battery lasts only for an hour and take 2-4 hrs to charge. What a damn!

Also, this doesn't comes with a charger, just a type C Cable. Though you can use old Samsung less than 2A chargers since GoPro says to use max 2 A chargers since it's battery is only 1220 mah and ideal charging is 1.5A only. And Official GoPro charger costs around 4K and doesn't comes in box. A spare battery costs min Rs.1800. So overall they are looting us.

it's a superb buy.... Go pro 8 is too good... videos are so lively and vivid.  Gopro 8 has hypersmooth 2.0 which gives you a real steady videos while driving walking, running etc..so it's a worth buy at this price range. you need to buy a 3 way shorty to use it properly mainly for holding ...overall satisfied with the purchase
Very good action camera.  But it is not for other videography
Battery backup is less than an hour and accessories are too high in price .not worth the price.

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.

reviews: Amazing delivery speed by Flipkart.
Purchased it for 30,790 on offer day.

Searched lot for mirror less and ended up in this. it was released in 2014 but this is the best in class for the price range till date. Picture quality is awesome in superior auto and intelligent auto, even a point and shoot knowledge is enough to take beautiful pictures. lot and lot of options in menus to be work, touch screen is lacking in this aspect. Got a brand new Sony memory card 16Gigs, a Sony carry case and...

This is really a fantastic camera for entry level photographers. If you love to make YouTube videos or any videos, or blogs, traveling , this is the best camera. This is so tiny  that i can keep this inside my jacket.
First of all thank you Flipkart for delivering on time . with in 3 days. I got free sony Bluetooth speaker. Camera is awesome . yet to explore .
This thing made me vlogger# .... I loved to travel and wanted something to carry along with me but should have great details in video.....
My search ended here and now i own travel vlog channel on youtube (wanderlust encoded). No phone or action camera can match the details this camera gives....till date.....
Used it for a month. Good quality picture and easy to use.

It's a good camera a small DSLR with APSC C sensor, because of not having a mirror u have to take extra care of your camera, external rays can damage your sensor, further to that it's the best camera u can bought for photography, kit lens is also good...
bot shandar ek no nyc camera......got speaker sony system free....thank you sony and flip cart.....
The battery drains on its own when kept switched off by 20% everyday and the return gets cancelled on its own when asked for one? Horrible service for a 43k camera,,

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.

description.Functions: Headless/IOC function. Usually, the forward direction of a flying multi-rotor is the same as the nose direction. By using Headless/IOC, the forward direction has nothing to do with nose direction. This lessens the steepness of the learning curve and allows the pilot to enjoy flight while slowly learning each specific orientation of the quadcopter.Equipped with the latest 6-axis flight control systems, 3D lock, More scheduled flight, operating more to the force! Equipped with HD camera to take photos and videos while flying! Bring a new perspective to your photos and videos from the air. Wifi FPV allows you to view photos & video while flying It supports any IOS and Android phones. The cell phone holder keeps your phone secure all the time. One key 360° roll, continuous roll for perfect action and wonderful performance

reviews: The Sony a6300 is currently the best semi pro SLR camera available. Period.

I cannot comment on the image capabilities of this camera as I'm not a professional photographer.
However, as a consumer I have noticed some limitations. The biggest drawback with this camera is battery life. I would highly recommend ...

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.

reviews: I have owned a point-n-shoot bridge camera so far. This is my first DSLR. I sincerely believe a DSLR is not something to be bought as a first camera. Buy a bridge point-and-shoot first. They offer 75+ % of the functionality of a DSLR, along with the possibility to explore various types of photography such as macro, landscapes, long zoom, etc. without the hassle of a different lens for each type of photography. If you know what kind of photography interests you, and you want to get better imag...

I have been using this D7200 for the last 3 months (not bought from Flipkart). Earlier I had 2 D7000 bodies, 1 Nikon 18-105mm VR lens and 1 Tamron 150-600mm VC lens. I sold off one of my D7000 with the 18-105mm and bought this D7200 with the 18-140mm VR and one 50mm f/1.8 prime lens.

Now i mostly use the D7200 with my tamron 150-600mm for bird and wildlife photography. D7200 is a huge improvement over the D7000 in terms of picture quality, sharpness of the clicked image and in many other aspe...

Very good camera. Does what it is supposed to do. Takes excellent pictures. The movie mode is a bit clunky and would have liked to be able to take stills in the middle of the movie. Focuses well in poor light but you do need to hold it steady!
Upgraded from D5200 to D7200.
I had read a lot of confusing reviews, that this kind of upgrade is not really an upgrade.
I must say, they were wrong.
One must not compare only the image quality.
The image quality is definitely better though.
Reality check after upgrading to D7200
1. Fast and accurate focus - this is a major factor.
2. AF fine tune - a big advantage
3. Awesome 3D tracking AF is way better.
4. SB700 flash can be used off camera without a transmitter.
5. The kit lens 18-140 is...

D7200 is one of the best DSLRs having best compliments from photographers around the world. It's a best budget camera for passionate wildlife photographer like me. Expeed 4 image processor with 24.2MP DX sensor having no Optical Low-Pass Filter makes it robust. It's 51 dynamic area auto focus points gives you fast and detailed reach of subjects. Happy with it.. Worth buying.. Thanks Nikon

Shopping and delivery was excellent in flip-kart. Delivered as promised.  After lot of speculation I had opted Nikon D7200 and as soon as it was delivered, I took it for an indoor photo-shoot. Outcome was excellent. I can really take pride in choosing this crop sensor DSLR. It suited by price range as well.
Thanks flip-kart and Nikon for the amazing product.
Thanks
Anish.

I was amazed by super quick delivery by Flipkart. Regarding Nikon D7200 this is one of the most advance prosumer APSC camera in the market. I was using D7100 . Though this D72000 camera is a minor upgrade to the precursor I noticed faster focusing and at least one stop increase in light sensitivity from sensor. I shoot mainly wildlife and landscape for which it is suitable. Those interested is sports photography might upgrade to Nikon D500.
Pros: Improved sensor with increase in native ISO
It's perfectly f9.Lens works perfectly well at f3.5 ..it's not a potrait lens but give almost good potraits...I've been using for 1month n more it is very good...it's a reasonable price.
It's better to buy a potrait lens extra nd a telephoto lens... U can do gr8 photography.

reviews: Good Mirrorless camera from sony. Awesome results with sigma 16mm or 30mm prime lense. Dont go for kit lense, only 18-135mm is good. Also get extra battery as battery backup for most Mirrorless are low. Pro: compactness, lightweight, fast focus, inbuilt slow motion & time lapse, image quality, flip screen for selfie or vlogging.  Cons: no in body stabilizer (like a6500), low battery, lightweight (some ppl prefer heaviness).

Best Apsc camera in the market period. The thing that distinguish it from competition is the autofocus speed which even far superior than almost 99 camera under 2 lakh. Also for a beginner such as me it's a good investment as learning camera and it can also be used professionally provided with right lenses. a6000 is also equally good if you are tight on budget.
In the end I would say I am very much satisfied with its performance although I haven't even explored its full potential. Real pict...

As you know without lenses cameras  are nothing. And Sony lenses are very expensive. It's not just a beginner level camera, its more than that, so if you are beginner and have high budget then only go for this camera. It can take amazing shots but you need spend more money in lenses. Kit lens is okay, but I will suggest you 50mm  F/1.8 (or 1.4 if you are rich enough to buy ) lens if you are new to photography. Else go out and have some research. Take decision wisely. Do like my comment if it ...
I was quite surprised by the delivery speed......got it the very next day.......thanks to flipkart
This is my first ILC.....was skeptical about the kit lens after watching a lot of reviews, but after using it i feel this lens is best suited for beginners and novice photographers.
Overall i am pretty happy with the purchase and am planning on including a fast prime with my kit.
Very good camera especially when u pair it with sigma prime lenses... Solid built quality. Good picture clarity in low light
As expected awesome experience with thecamera,eye tracking is blazingly fast. Super crispy video from the camera. Raw photos are also looking good. The lens is not that good for portraits.
wow..amazing
awesome
awesome camera best apsc camera in the world

Great camera overall. Can't go too far with the kit lens. The OSS in the kit lens didn't make much of a difference for slow shutter shots. The real-time face tracking is great. Since it's a new camera, it's hard to get accessories in the Indian market yet.
